text: Abaho, watumigwa wa Kilisto na wavyele na wanhu wose wamtogole Kilisto walamula kuwasagula wanhu kulawa mmwanza wao, wawatume wachole kudiwambo da Antiokia hamoja na Paulo na Banaba. Avo wawasagula wanhu wabili, Yuda, yakalile na twaga da ikabili dikemigwa Balisaba, na Sila, wakalile vilangizi wa wanhu wamtogole Kilisto.
